name: Forum Ventures
headquarter_location_freeform: Toronto, New York City, San Francisco
locations: Toronto; New York City; San Francisco
description: Forum Ventures specializes in investing in and accelerating B2B SaaS startups. With a focus on early-stage companies, they offer a comprehensive suite of services including seed funding, an accelerator program, and a venture studio to support founders from concept to scale. Their team, comprised of experienced SaaS founders and operators, provides hands-on support in areas such as go-to-market strategies, product development, and fundraising. Forum Ventures has made over 250 pre-seed and seed stage investments and is dedicated to building a supportive community for SaaS founders.
portfolio_companies: Aicon Construction, Adinmo, Advanced Symbolics, Agreemint, Akute Health, Allbound, Alvin Finance, Answerable, Arcade Quest, Archslate, Arkestro, Arnie, Ascendo.ai, Ascent Platform, Attune, AudiencePlus

professional_info.investment_thesis: Invest in early-stage SaaS founders first, and their companies second, with a focus on making the B2B SaaS journey easier, more accessible, and successful.
professional_info.value_add: Expertise, honest feedback, network, resources, and community support
